name: Original Art - Wisdom Angel
description:
The third in a series of Serenity Prayer Angels, this angel represents Wisdom. Although I am constantly striving to know the difference between what I can change and what I cannot, I know in my heart that, of course, the only thing I can change is me.

She is the same size as the Serenity Angel. Like all my other original art, she is hand sculpted by me and then I make a mold so I can reproduce lots of them to keep the prices low. I cast them in super hard Hydrostone and then hand paint them to be used indoors or out. 


Please click on images to enlarge and on page 2 for Full Length View.


 She is also available in Pure White and a Rustic Stain. 

Specifications:
 -The plaque is about 5" x 18" x 1/2" 
   thick, but because they are hand-
   made sizes can vary.
- She is cast stone with a hand-
   painted or rustic stained finish.
- She has an embedded 
   hook for hanging
- Each angel is handmade to order, 
  so variations in color may occur
- Most orders take 2 - 4 weeks, but 
   please contact me for rush orders
- Minimum Wholesale Order $200
- All J. Johns Designs products 
   come with a 100% money back 
   guarantee
- If you are ever unhappy with any 
   of my products for any reason, 
   I will happily refund your money

name: Original Art - Mermaid
description:
This is my newest sculpture named "Reach for the Stars", and I had so much fun making her. Since I am traveling by the ocean and the Gulf of Mexico, I thought a Mermaid would be in order. Do you have a special graduate that can use a positive message to send her off?

I used some molds of actual shells that my friend Bev had made for her pottery. Like all my wall plaques, it is cast in super hard cast stone, and painted with weather resistant paint so it can be hung in your garden or inside your home. I have decided since this is the beginning for her, she will be a signed limited edition piece. 

Available in Antique White (page 1) or Ocean Blue (page 2)

name: Original Art - Serenity Angel
description:
Please click on images to enlarge and on page 2 for Full Length View.


This is my original angel in honor of my parents who were so dear to me and who I was blessed to care for in their final years. She was made while I was caring for my Dad and has always been a favorite.

I have added her to my series of Serenity Prayer Angels as Serenity.

I sculpted the original model in clay, then made a rubber mold and reproduce her in ultra strong Hydrostone. She is shown painted in Antique White with durable outdoor paint so she is able to hang in the garden. Don’t worry about the cracks – they are purely superficial and decorative. She is also available in a Rustic Finish. 



Specifications:
 -The plaque is about 5" x 18" x 1/2" 
   thick, but because they are hand-
   made sizes can vary.
- She is cast stone with an Antique White
   or Rustic stained finish.
- She has an embedded

name: Original Art - Four Season Leaf Coasters
description:
These coasters are made from the leaf of a wild grape vine that overtook the quonset hut we played in as children. It has so many wonderful memories for me. 

The coasters are 4 x 4 and are absorbent so they soak up all the condensation. They have cork feet to protect your furniture. You may also order them in individual seasons if you prefer just one color. They come boxed in a set of 4.

- Each coaster is handmade to order, 
  so variations in color may occur

name: Original Art - Acceptance Angel
description:
Click on Page 2 for the full view of this piece.

This angel design is dedicated to my sister Vicki who died of cancer when she was 43. The butterfly she is holding is especially symbolic of her and the transition she made to a more beautiful existence. A good friend wrote a song for her funeral called "You are a Butterfly", so I chose to honor her with this design. "Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly". It symbolizes my acceptance of God's will for us.


Specifications:
 -The plaque is about 9" x 12" x 1/2" 
   thick, but because it is hand-
   made sizes can vary.
- She is cast stone with an antique white
   or rustic stained finish.
- She can be used both inside and 
   outside, and has an embedded 
   hook for hanging
- Each angel is handmade to order, 
  so variations in color may occur.

name: Original Art - Leaf Tealight Holders
description:
Perfect for your Seasonal table settings, these charming little tealight  holders are molded from a real leaf and are painted in Spring, Fall, or Winter. They come in a set of three with matching tealights. You can order them in a set with all three seasons or have a set of three in just one season. They are my original design and are hand cast and painted by me.

They have cork pads to protect your fine furniture from any scratches. Set of 3 approximately 3" around. You can also order it in the custom color of your choice - within reason.

- Each tea light holder is handmade to order, 
  so variations in color may occur

name: Craft Product - Florentine Coasters
description:
This Coaster design was made from a rubber stamp that I loved, so I pressed it into clay and made a mold of it. Guess that doesn't quite count as an original design but it is hand cast like all my other products in durable Hydrostone and hand painted by me in a variety of colors.

It is absorbent and will catch any drips before they land on your table. It has cork pads to protect your fine furniture from any scratches.  Set of Four approximately 4" square. Hand wash. You can also order it in the custom color of your choice - within reason.

- Each coaster is handmade to order,

name: Original Art - Pear Coasters
description:
This little pear was my first coaster design. I used my biggest coffee mug to make the impression for the fat part of the pear so it would fit any size mug you might want to use.

name: New Craft Product - Fleur de lis Plaque
description:
This Plaque isn't an original design of mine, but I thought it went so well with my other products. A friend was asking for a fleur de lis plaque and because I didn't have time to create a whole new product for her, I found this mold and fell in love with it.

I have shown it in a Rustic Stain Finish. It measures 7" square and is made of the same durable cast stone as my other products and has the same durable outdoor paint, so you can use it outside with confidence. Hang it on your fence with the integral hook on the back.

name: Original Art - Serenity Prayer Plaque
description:
This is the Serenity Prayer to go with the Angels. It is one of my favorites and has gotten be through many difficulties in my life. I have finally gained the wisdom to know that the only thing I can change is myself and my attitude.

I sculpted the original model in clay, then made a rubber mold and reproduce it in ultra strong Hydrostone. The plaque is shown painted in A Rustic Stain with durable outdoor paint so it is able to hang in the garden. Don’t worry about the cracks – they are purely superficial and decorative. It is also available in a Rustic Finish.

description: This beautiful Wood Coaster Holder is created in Walnut and Pecan by Master Wood Crafter Tim Eggers to use with all my coasters. These are also available in White or Black.

name: Craft Product - Rosette Wall Plaque
description:
This rosette isn't an original design of mine, but I thought it went so well with my other products. I found this in a store and I loved the design but it was a hideous color and I knew I could make it look better. So I took it home and made a mold of it, and now I can paint it in all sorts of wonderful colors. 

I have shown it in an Antique White and it is also available in a Rustic Stain. It measures 6 1/2" square and is made of the same durable cast stone as my other products and has the same durable outdoor paint, so you can use it outside with confidence. Hang it on your fence with the integral hook on the back.

name: Commission Portraits Starting at
description:
These are priced by size and complexity and level of detail, so contact me for a quote. Pricing begins at $500.00 for a 16 x 20 of a face only. 

I have been a portrait artist since I was 13 and did a pencil portrait of my grandmother. I did a lot of commissions of my parent's friends and others in pastel when I was in my early 20's then went on to my career of remodeling design. I have recently returned to my first love of painting portraits so I hope you enjoy them. 

Ebony and Ivory is of my son Allen and his new bride Shawnt'a. This was their wedding present.

Sumpter Priddy II is 87 years old and quite a character. He showed up at a friend's garage sale and somehow through the conversation he ended up commissioning me to paint a portrait of his life with his horse and cattle and sheep. He was President of the Virginia Retail Merchants Association, so all these things are in the painting of him. 

Then he asked me to paint a portrait of his father Sumpter Priddy from a photograph taken in 1919.
